quotes.quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 傻瓜都能寫出電腦能理解的程式。優秀的工程師寫出的是人類能讀懂的程式。
quotes.author: Martin Fowler

quotes.quote: An infinite number of monkeys typing into GNU emacs would never make a good program.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 讓無限多的猴子在 GNU Emacs 上打字也不會產生一個好的程式。
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: If you need more than 3 levels of indentation, you're screwed anyway, and should fix your program.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 如果你的程式裡需要有超過三層的縮進，那麼你已經搞砸了，應該修改你的程式。
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: A good programmer is someone who always looks both ways before crossing a one-way street.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 一個好的工程師是那種過單行道馬路都要左顧右盼的人。
quotes.author: Doug Linder

quotes.quote: The three chief virtues of a programmer are: Laziness, Impatience and Hubris.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 工程師會具有的美德：懶惰、暴躁、傲慢。
quotes.author: Larry Wall

quotes.quote: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 寫程式時要保持這種心態：就好像將來要維護你這些程式的人是一位殘暴的精神病患者，而且他知道你住在哪。
quotes.author: John F. Woods

quotes.quote: One man's crappy software is another man's full time job.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 一個人寫的爛軟體將會給另一個人帶來一份全職工作。
quotes.author: Jessica Gaston

quotes.quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 按程式行數來評估軟體開發的進度，就如同按重量來評估飛機建造的進度。
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Walking on water and developing software from a specification are easy if both are frozen.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 在水上行走和按照特定需求開發開發軟體都很容易——前提是它們都是凍結狀態。
quotes.author: Edward V Berard

quotes.quote: The hardest part of design … is keeping features out.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 軟體設計最困難的部分⋯⋯是阻擋新功能的引入。
quotes.author: Donald Norman

quotes.quote: Java is to JavaScript what Car is to Carpet.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: Java 之於 JavaScript 的關係就如同狗和熱狗。
quotes.author: Chris Heilmann

quotes.quote: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 程式必須是為了給人看而寫，命令機器執行只是附帶任務。
quotes.author: Abelson / Sussman

quotes.quote: Copy and paste is a design error.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 複製貼上是一種設計錯誤。
quotes.author: David Parnas

quotes.quote: Computers are good at following instructions, but not at reading your mind.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 電腦善於遵循指令，但不善於理解你的思維。
quotes.author: Donald Knuth

quotes.quote: Software and cathedrals are much the same – first we build them, then we pray.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 軟體和教堂非常相似——建成之後我們就開始祈禱。
quotes.author: Sam Redwine

quotes.quote: If you give someone a program, you will frustrate them for a day; if you teach them how to program, you will frustrate them for a lifetime.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 如果你交給某人一個程式，你將折磨他一整天；如果你教某人如何編寫程式，你將折磨他一輩子。
quotes.author: David Leinweber

quotes.quote: Nine people can’t make a baby in a month.
quotes.quote_zh_tw: 九個人不能讓一個孩子在一個月內出生。
quotes.author: Fred Brooks
